Detailed Description

The mother class of all service oriented classes of the OMiSCID service package.

This class is the mother class of all service oriented classes. It defines common values defined in DNS-SD documentation like fields length.

Definition at line 60 of file ServicesCommon.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Omiscid::CommonServiceValues::SizeOfBuffers
 

Defines length of service information.

According to the DNS-SD documentation, the maximal length of all fields for a service names are defined as expressed in this enum.

Enumerator:
ServiceField  the service name length
ProtocolAndTransportField  the protocol and transport size
ServiceNameLength  the complete unique name length of a service like "Doms._printer._tcp.local."
RegtypeLength  the length of the protocol and the transport protocol for a service, i.e "_printer._tcp"

enum Omiscid::CommonServiceValues::TransportProtocol
 

Defines the transport protocol used by the service.

This enum is used to define the control protocol used by the service. Supported protocols are TCP and UDP.

Enumerator:
UNKNOWN  set when the transport protocol is undefined or unsupported.
TCP  set when the service uses TCP. It is defined in Socket.h using the usual SOCK_STEAM value.
UDP  set when the service uses UCP. It is defined in Socket.h using the usual SOCK_DGRAM value.
